title: Kung Fu Panda 2 In Review - Every Kung Fu Panda Movie Ranked & Recapped
description:
This episode of Kinda Funny In Review we rank, review, and recap the 2011 Dreamworks classic Kung Fu Panda 2.

Time stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:28 - Thoughts
00:19:45 - Plot
00:52:55 - RaGu BaGu
